profile.name: dan
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Remote Developer | JavaScript & React Native Expert
profile.summary: Highly motivated and detail-oriented developer with a strong passion for building scalable, efficient, and maintainable software solutions. Proficient in JavaScript and React Native, with experience in open-source projects and Lean theorem prover MCP.
profile.company: Based on the provided information, I would recommend Arista Networks as a potential employer for 'dan'.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Developed and maintained multiple software applications using JavaScript and React Native, ensuring high performance and scalability.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Worked on various projects for clients, including FormatJS, ssr-performance-showdown, fastify-vite, expo, and react-native-svg.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development and maintenance of FormatJS, ensuring its stability and security.
